title: Avgolemono soup
description: I had never seen this egg-thickened soup served with a poached egg, but it seemed like a good idea so I tried it – and it is. Like many a simple soup, its success depends on a really good stock, so homemade chicken stock is best.
ingredients: bones from a 1.5kg/3lb 5oz chicken, or 450g/1lb wings and/or drumsticks, or leftover bones from a roasted chicken
